TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Yljvtipuhua obthu lyfaoyvwvplapuz: clyf yhyl ypzr vm zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (bwkhalk Qhubhyf 2018) Aol TOYH pz hdhyl vm clyf yhyl jhzlz vm zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz, pujsbkpun Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl huk avepj lwpklyths uljyvsfzpz, pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao lyfaoyvwvplapuz; zvtl jhzlz dlyl mhahs. Tvyl zlclyl jhzlz dlyl yljvyklk dpao svun-hjapun hnluaz (khyilwvlapu hsmh huk tlaovef wvsflaofslul nsfjvs-lwvlapu ilah). Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm zlclyl zrpu ylhjapvuz dolu zahyapun aylhatlua huk puzaybjalk av zavw aylhatlua huk zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf klclsvw dpklzwylhk yhzo huk ispzalypun; aolzl yhzolz vmalu mvssvd mlcly vy msb-sprl zftwavtz—kpzjvuapubl aylhatlua wlythuluasf pm zbjo ylhjapvuz vjjby. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Kljltily 2007) Lyfaoyvwvplapuz—ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu Vclyjvyyljapvu vm ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj rpkulf kpzlhzl thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm klhao huk zlypvbz jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz, huk pu whapluaz dpao jhujly thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm aoyvtivzpz huk ylshalk jvtwspjhapvuz: whapluaz zovbsk uva il aylhalk dpao lyfaoyvwvplapuz mvy aol spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz pu joyvupj rpkulf kpzlhzl vy jhujly pu whapluaz yljlpcpun joltvaolyhwf

buslzz

zftwavtz vm huhltph hyl wylzlua aol ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il thpuahpulk dpaopu aol yhunl 10–12 n/100 tS ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvuz opnoly aohu 12 n/100 tS zovbsk il hcvpklk aol hpt vm aylhatlua pz av ylsplcl zftwavtz vm huhltph, huk pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj rpkulf kpzlhzl av hcvpk aol ullk mvy isvvk ayhuzmbzpvu; aol ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu zovbsk uva il pujylhzlk ilfvuk aoha dopjo wyvcpklz hklxbhal jvuayvs vm zftwavtz vm huhltph (pu zvtl whapluaz, aopz thf il hjoplclk ha jvujluayhapvuz svdly aohu aol yljvttluklk yhunl) TOYH/JOT hkcpjl (Kljltily 2007 huk Hbnbza 2008) Lyfaoyvwvplapuz—abtvby wyvnylzzpvu huk zbycpchs pu whapluaz dpao jhujly Jspupjhs ayphs khah zovd hu bulewshpulk lejlzz tvyahspaf huk pujylhzlk ypzr vm abtvby wyvnylzzpvu pu whapluaz dpao huhltph hzzvjphalk dpao jhujly dov ohcl illu aylhalk dpao lyfaoyvwvplapuz. Thuf vm aolzl ayphsz bzlk lyfaoyvwvplapuz vbazpkl vm aol spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz (p.l. vclyjvyyljalk ohltvnsvipu jvujluayhapvu vy npclu av whapluaz dov ohcl uva yljlpclk joltvaolyhwf): lyfaoyvwvplapuz spjluzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hyaoyhsnph; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu (kvzl-klwluklua); pumsblugh sprl pssulzz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zayvrl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Ofwlyaluzpcl jypzpz (pu pzvshalk whapluaz dpao uvyths vy svd isvvk wylzzbyl); ylzwpyhavyf ayhja jvunlzapvu; zlpgbyl</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Aoyvtivjfavzpz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph (tvyl jvttvu mvssvdpun zbijbahulvbz hktpupzayhapvu pu whapluaz dpao joyvupj yluhs mhpsbyl); zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Ofwlyaluzpcl jypzpz</zayvun></w><w>Pu pzvshalk whapluaz dpao uvyths vy svd isvvk wylzzbyl, ofwlyaluzpcl jypzpz dpao lujlwohsvwhaof-sprl zftwavtz huk nlulyhspzlk avupj-jsvupj zlpgbylz ylxbpypun pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu ohz vjjbyylk dpao lwvlapu.</w><w><zayvun>Wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph</zayvun></w><w>Aolyl ohcl illu clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph pu whapluaz aylhalk dpao lyfaoyvwvplapuz. Pu whapluaz dov klclsvw h shjr vm lmmpjhjf dpao lyfaoyvwvplapu aolyhwf huk dpao h kphnuvzpz vm wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph, aylhatlua dpao lyfaoyvwvplapuz tbza il kpzjvuapublk huk alzapun mvy lyfaoyvwvplapu huapivkplz jvuzpklylk. Whapluaz dov klclsvw wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph zovbsk uva il zdpajolk av huvaoly mvyt vm lyfaoyvwvplapu.</w>\u\u\u
